errors.no-permission: You don't have permission for that command! If you believe this is a mistake make sure you have the role called `:role:` assigned to yourself.
errors.missing-permissions: Tickety is missing the `:permission:` permission to perform this command!
errors.no-premium: This command is only available in the premium version of Tickety. You can buy the premium version on https://panel.tickety.xyz/
errors.unknown-error: An unknown error has occured while performing this command. Please report this error to the Tickety team! https://discord.gg/AHJYyyb
errors.kick-hierarchy: I can't kick that user because he is higher than me!
errors.ban-hierarchy: I can't ban that user because he is higher than me!
errors.long-cooldown: You can only run this command twice per minute!
errors.invalid-arguments: Invalid arguments! Send :prefix:help to see what arguments are needed.
errors.no-admin-role: Please create a role called exactly 'Support Team' in order for Tickety to work!
errors.invalid-tag-cateogry: Please enter a valid category name or id!
errors.not-in-ticket: You can only run this command in a ticket channel!
errors.blacklisted: You have been blacklisted from Tickety commands in this server

about.who-am-i-text: I am Tickety, and I will try my best to help everyone! If I am in a discord server, people can use me to create tickets in order to get help. See all my commands by sending `-help`
about.my-website-text: You can reach me at http://tickety.xyz/
about.premium-text: To support my development I offer some features that are only available to premium users. Tickety Premium is available on http://tickety.xyz/ at a low cost.
about.premium-server: ðŸŽŸ This server uses the premium version
about.non-premium-server: ðŸŽ« This server uses the free version

help.only-user-cmds: In this help message only user commands are being shown, for a full list of the commands you should have the `:role:` role assigned to yourself.
help.all-cmds-shown: These are all of my commands

setprefix.invalid-prefix: Your given prefix is invalid! Please pick a prefix that is no longer than 3 characters.

setlang.invalid-language:
Please pick one of these supported languages: :languages:
Don't see your language? Add it! https://discord.gg/AHJYyyb

setopen.description: Change whether or not people can open tickets
setopen.changed-open: Your users can now open tickets again.
setopen.changed-closed: Your users won't be able to create tickets now.

new.guild-closed: This server has temporarily disabled the creation of tickets
new.opened-with: Your ticket with :with: has been opened :channel:
new.default-message:
Dear :with:,

Thank you for contacting our support team!

We will come right back to you! In the mean time please describe your questions thoroughly.

status.description: Get information about the status of Tickety
status.tickets-total: **:tickets-total:** tickets have been opened since v5

close.are-you-sure:
Are you sure you want to close this ticket? The messages will be gone.
Send `:prefix:close` again to close the ticket.
Your request will be voided in 20 seconds.

closeall.are-you-sure:
Are you sure you want to close all tickets? This can have devastating consequences!
Send `:prefix:closeall` again to **close all tickets**.
Your request will be voided in 20 seconds.

rename.success: This ticket has been renamed to :name:

setlog.success: The ticket log has been set

settranscriptlog.success: The transcript log has been set

transcript.description: Get a transcript of the conversation

setmsg.description: Set the welcome message for a ticket

add.description: Add a user to a ticket
add.not-in-ticket: When performing this command outside of a ticket you have to tag a channel
add.already-can-read: That user can already read this ticket channel
add.added: :addeduser: has been added to the ticket
add.addedtothis: :addeduser: has been added to this ticket

setrole.updated: The new admin role has been set

blacklist.description: Blacklist a user from Tickety commands
blacklist.cant-admin: You can't blacklist :user: as he has the admin role! If you really want to blacklist the user, remove his admin role.

unblacklist.description: Remove a user from the blacklist
unblacklist.unblacklisted: :user: has been removed from the blacklist successfully!

blacklists.description: View all of the current blacklists
blacklists.all-blacklists: These are all of the blacklists currently for this server

errors.no-permission: Je hebt geen toestemming voor deze actie! Als je denkt dat dit een fout is, zorg dan dat je de `:role:` rol hebt.
errors.missing-permissions: Tickety mist de machtiging `:permission:` om deze actie te voltooien!
errors.no-premium: Deze functie is alleen beschikbaar in de premium versie van Tickety. Je kan premium kopen op https://panel.tickety.xyz/
errors.unknown-error: Een onbekende fout is voorgekomen tijdens het uitvoeren van deze opdracht. Rapporteer deze error aan het Tickety Team! https://discord.gg/AHJYyyb
errors.kick-hierarchy: Ik kan die gebruiker niet kicken, want zijn rol is hoger dan mijn rol!
errors.ban-hierarchy: Ik kan die gebruiker niet bannen, want zijn rol hoger dan mijn rol!
errors.long-cooldown: Je kan dit maximaal twee keer per minuut uitvoeren!
errors.invalid-arguments: Onvoldoende Argumenten! Stuur :prefix:help om te zien welke argumenten benodigd zijn.
errors.no-admin-role: Maak een rol genaamd precies 'Support Team' zodat Tickety kan werken!
errors.invalid-tag-category: Geef de naam of id van een bestaande categorie
errors.not-in-ticket: Dat kan je alleen in een ticket doen!

help.only-user-cmds: In dit bericht worden alleen admin commands weergegeven, voor alle commands moet je de `:role` rol hebben.

setprefix.invalid-prefix: Je ingevoerde prefix is invalide! Geef een prefix van 1 tot 3 karakters.

setlang.invalid-language: Kies een van deze ondersteunde talen: :languages:

setopen.description: Bepaal of tickets gemaakt kunnen worden
setopen.changed-open: Tickets kunnen nu weer gemaakt worden
setopen.changed-closed: Tickets kunnen nu niet meer gemaakt worden

new.guild-closed: Deze server heeft het maken van tickets tijdelijk uitgeschakeld
new.opened-with: Je ticket samen met :with: is gemaakt :channel:
new.default-message:
Geachte :with:,

We zullen zo tot u komen. Ondertussen kunt u alvast uw vragen stellen, zodat we u meteen kunnen helpen.

status.tickets-total: Er zijn **:tickets-total:** tickets geopend sinds v5

close.are-you-sure:
Weet je zeker dat je deze ticket wil sluiten? Alle berichten zullen verloren gaan.
Stuur `:prefix:close` opnieuw om te sluiten.

closeall.are-you-sure:
Weet je zeker dat je all tickets wil sluiten? Dit kan grote consequenties hebben!
Stuur `:prefix:closeall` nog een keer om **alle tickets te sluiten**.

setcategory.description: Verander in welke categorie de tickets ontstaan
